root.str: Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 220 rounds.
Highlights vehicular threats in low light conditions up to 500 meters.
Grants access to main battle tanks
Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, applies automated targeting systems to nearby constructed turrets, allowing them fire upon enemies while unmanned. NC use only.
Allows the Heavy Assault to carry additional rocket launcher magazines, and auto-reloads the weapon while holstered.
APPLICATION SENT. A RESPONSE WILL BE SENT TO YOU ONCE THEY HAVE REVIEWED IT.
Get a selection of items to outfit your Combat Medic at a discounted price!
Further improve the Lightning's maximum forward speed and acceleration.
Applies a decal to your armor or vehicle. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24.
[*target*] cannot be invited because you are not the squad leader.
Order of the Dragon Vehicle Decal
Command acknowledged. Initiating squad redeploy, protocol: Steel Rain.
[*player1*] has held the Drone for #count([*slot2*]) seconds!
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 5% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
This weapon tool variant can spawn a Recon Drone which you control to help spot enemies and threats for your empire
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "W" Gold Hood Ornament.
Allows the Squad Leader to place purple smoke as a rally point.
Adds 2 rounds to the default magazine size.
Applies a special kidRiot decal to your armor.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 600 rounds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Foster:</font> Nicely done, operative. These components will allow us to manufacture supercell capacitors for the Containment Sites, and may yet have other uses in the coming days.
A 10x magnitude zoom precision sniper scope.
Reduces damage taken from frag grenades, common explosions, tank mines, and C4 by 50%; and infantry rockets, light anti-vehicle, and air-to-ground explosives by 20%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 48 rockets.
For those who want to destroy everything but still look good doing it. TR use only.
Customize your Lightning with this modification. All factions can use this gear.
This customization adds a Light Coral decal to the cockpit glass. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 50 rounds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
Allows cortium to be used to construct an Aspis Anti-Aircraft Phalanx Tower that may be manned by allied players.
You do not have any owned vehicles to manage.
You automatically repair 7.5% health every second. Damage disables repairs for 8 seconds.
Apply the Amerish Forest camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Warpgate map terminals allow long range transportation for infantry units. These terminals can be used to travel to any linked location in an instant.
Gunner Kill Assist Share - Spitfire Auto-Turret
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 36 rounds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Enlistment failed - your outfit is already enlisted in the war.
This customization adds a Green Olive decal to the cockpit glass. All factions can use this gear.
Adds chassis lights to the under carriage of the ANT. Usable by all factions.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 350 rounds.
Uplink does not have enough power to reach target.
These pads are often used to bypass geographical barriers, ascend to higher ground, or travel quickly around a facility. Step on this thrust pad to continue!
The Twin-Saron is a high-capacity variant of the standard issue Saron Laser Cannon, meant for use with interceptor variants of the Scythe. VS use only.
Weapon mount on the roof towards the front of the Sunderer. Operated by the passenger in seat 2.
Proceed to an allied vehicle terminal and spawn a Sunderer.
This device will teleport you to another location nearby.
Applies a decal to your armor. NC use only.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. NC use only.
Adds 12 rounds to the default magazine size.
Allows the Squad Leader to place orange smoke as a rally point.
Adds 12 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 8 shells.
Reduce the acquire timer of the Vanguard for 1 hour. Rank 6 required.
Contains a TS4 Haymaker plus 1000 Certs
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. NC use only.
Adds cosmetic lighting to your Prowler. TR use only.

The Proximity Radar certification for the Magrider has been removed from the Utility slot and certification points have been refunded. Proximity Radar is now available as a Defense slot certification and can be repurchased there.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "0" Hood Ornament.
Select your primary weapon, attach an optic, then Resupply.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.6 seconds.
Allows the user to carry three additional Rocklet Rifle magazines.

Activate to override the Defector's cooling system regulators turning it into a walking bomb that explodes at the end of 12 seconds. While active, you gain 40% additional armor, lose 10% movement speed, and weapons no longer produce heat. If killed before the countdown is complete, you will be defused.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> And maybe, just maybe, there's candy inside! That's what old SPRK-33 over here tells me, anyway.
Grants access to the Nano-Emitter, a device that when placed will heal friendly soldiers in the immediate area for a period of time.
Squad: Be a Platoon leader 50 times
Reduces minimum cone of fire and cone of fire recovery time when firing from the hip.
<font color="#00FFAA">SPRK-33:</font> *SPARK* *FIZZLE* *SPARK* *POP* (This suggests that the empires have started to deploy the new prototype vehicles. And that there is an opportunity for profit.)
Adds 20 rounds to the default magazine size.

<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Foster:</font> Monsters abound this time of year, be it a Bastion looming overhead or an enemy soldier standing across the valley, but few compare in destructive might to the rare and malevolent Galact-O-Lantern.
This customization adds a Pink decal to the cockpit glass. VS use only.
Unlocks all available optics for the NS-61 Emissary.
Customize your Flash with this blue antenna ball. VS use only.
Apply the single use Indar Dunes camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Find the destination of the researcher
Earn this title by getting fifty kill shots with a Patriot Flare Gun
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 17 rounds.
The Magrider defensive certification 'Reinforced Front Armor' has been removed. Spent certifications have been refunded.
This gold, left-handed NS-10 Burster fires flak rounds which detonate near enemy aircraft, shredding their armor. All factions can use NS weapons.
Customize your Flash with this blue blinking antenna ball. VS use only.
Adds a touch of 'Bling' to your Prowler. TR use only.
PlanetSide 2 celebrates six years of war.
Customize your Flash and tear up the roads of Auraxis with these tire spikes. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the amount of ammunition in each magazine by 9.
Adds the Vertigo style hubcaps to your Flash. VS use only.
Reduces minimum cone of fire and cone of fire recovery time.
This customization adds a Orange decal to the cockpit glass. All factions can use this gear.

Chambered for the powerful .357 magnum cartridge, the snub-nosed Underboss revolver features a faster rate of fire and more controllable recoil than its bigger NS-44 brother. All factions can use this weapon.
Turning this off will toggle off squad and platoon login notifications. (Default: On)
When activated, the Flash is encased in a coating that allows it to slip through enemy gate shields. Lasts 10 seconds. Can be activated once every 60 seconds.
Apply the Yellow Chrome camo pattern to your armor.
Increases the rotation speed of the Vanguard by 9 degrees/second.
Reduces the time required to establish a lock-on with the weapon by 0.375 seconds.
Displays the distance to the target.
Standard Vanu Sovereignty Heavy Assault Helmet
-- Chapter 3 has yet to be unveiled --
Passively increases the ANT's total Cortium Storage by 1000.
Allows soldiers to carry 3 additional magazines for both their primary and sidearm weapons.

<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Huh. No one has been to one of these places in years. I once heard that Vanu fanatics could hear the voices of their gods if they listened closely enough. Perhaps there will be more to see at the next one.
Grants access to a single-use Restoration Kit which regenerates health for 12 seconds.
Upon being revived, damage taken is reduced by 20% for 1.75 seconds. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Chrome Lucan Hood Ornament.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> Nott Amp Station is certainly not what it used to be.
Unlocks a metal decal representing the Shattered Warpgate campaign. This decal can be applied to armor, vehicles, and outfits.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.6 seconds.
You will automatically reload your weapon when you empty the magazine. You can reload before the magazine is empty using the reload key.
THE WAR IS OVER! PRESENTING YOUR WINNERS:
Raid leader is currently considering another request.
Click here to set your camo.
This unconventional hatchet has been designed to sow maximum terror on the battlefield. NC use only.
Apply the single use Indar Canyons v1 camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 400 rounds.
The Rebel's Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. NC use only.
Increases the vertical thrust speed of the Reaver by 15KPH.

While active, health regenerates by 75 per second and you flinch 95% less when struck by projectiles. Receiving damage will momentarily pause the health regen granted by this ability. Ability lasts up to 15 seconds.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
Increased muzzle velocities due to the Perforator's extended barrel make it an excellent choice for reducing the distance targets must be lead.
The Seeker Heavy Crossbow fires hardlight bolts capable of considerable damage at long range. The weapon has a short delay before firing to stabilize the photon lattice of each bolt.
There are no consequences in this area, so it's alright to make mistakes and take as much time as you need to get acclimated.
Creates a laser grid overhead that will severely injure enemy infantry that pass through it.
Apply the Mongo Spots camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.
MAX units can equip one weapon on each arm. Both weapons can be fired simultaneously. MAX have access to a variety of anti-infantry, anti-vehicle, and anti-aircraft options.

Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 1 second, prevents the vehicle from being auto detected on the mini-map and reduces detection from enemy Engagement Radars by 400 meters.
Holographic laser reflex sight designed t o create a lightweight, yet accurate, sight
Applies a camo to your armor, weapon, or vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Turning this on will draw shadows through fog, this option may decrease performance. (Default: Off)
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Liberator. TR use only.
Increases the top speed of the Lightning by 2 KPH.
Increases the lifespan of the Ammunition Pack to 5 minutes; also increases the radius in which the pack will resupply ammo to 6 meters.
Investigate the abandoned Elli Amp Station
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 35 rounds.
Deployed Spear Phalanx Turret will not be available until the new placement system is complete
Applies a decal to your vehicle. Available for all factions.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. TR use only.
Increases the top speed of the Galaxy by 12 KPH.

While deployed, shares the locations of enemy infantry within 30 meters every 1.5 seconds; the Infiltrator also receives live movement updates of enemies within 20 meters. Lasts 120 seconds, two can be carried.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 540 rounds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> Please equip the Neutralizer Device and head to the planet's surface. Consider it a "tactical" device in your arsenal, for Esamir and elsewhere.
The powerful Hunter QCX Quad-Cam crossbow is a lightweight sidearm, capable of silently taking out targets up to medium range with deadly precise bolts.
Kill enemies by running over them or earn ram bonuses while in a Lightning.
This armor can only be worn by NC Combat Medics.
Attaches a 2x optical zoom to your weapon.

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> These Viridian weirdos were experimenting on people! Sounds more like the Vanu Sovereignty than a corporation. Maybe our scientists could do something with the results.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.6 seconds.
Improves the sensor darts scanning rate by a total of 1 second and extends the range to 45 meters; also extends each darts lifespan to 40 seconds and increases ammo capacity by a total of 2.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 22 rockets.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Galaxy to 18 minutes.
Adds the Wilderness Bumper to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.
Apply the single use Desert Scrub v2 camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Engineers provide support on the battlefield. They can repair mechanical objects, resupply their allies with ammunition, and can deploy various battlefield objects.
When learning to fly, stay in areas with high allied populations and travel with a friend.
The facility is secure. Excellent work.
<font color="#00FFAA">Knightly:</font> There you go. We can begin once the Signal Scanner has been equipped into your tactical slot.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Flash by 120 seconds.
Apply the single use Amerish Leaf camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the top speed of the Reaver by 20 KPH.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 450 rounds.
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.
Adds 15 rounds to the default magazine size.
Use tier 5 implants to create a tier 5 implant.
Apply the single use Scrub Forest camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
The Hyena fires short range anti-aircraft missiles that are dumb-fired, but will lock-on to enemy aircraft in close proximity. This weapon specializes in combating mobile enemy fighters.
Applies a decal to your armor. Usable by all factions.
Bounty Contract purchase failed! Your target is no longer online!

So, a client just requested a server's worth of telemetry data for a host of NSX weapons. You look the type willin' to get their hands dirty. So, here's the deal. You go into the field, bang bang. We record the data from your combat escapades and ship it to our benefactor. How about it, slick, you in?



This mission will randomly select an NSX weapon from a pool. If you do not own the weapon selected then you must purchase or trial the weapon in order to complete the mission.
Increases the weapon's minimum damage from 100 to 112, while reducing magazine size by 25.
We've got a hostile MAX in the area.
Weapons in the rifle family include bolt action, semi-auto, and scout rifles.
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Ah, there's the researcher. She's not looking good. See what you can find out while you still can.

Adding Credit Card
Press ESC to Cancel
Outfit invite failed. Player is not the same faction.

This 4th Anniversary Edition of the EM4 Longshot houses an overclocked propulsion coil for projectiles that both travel faster and hit harder in comparison to other bolt-action sniper rifles. NC use only.
Apply the Indar Canyons v2 camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
<font color="#00FFAA">Malfunctioning Spy Drone:</font> Update, strayShotMaster011. Download currently 50% complete. Continue to prevent interruptions.
Apply the Splatter camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.
The ABLE 1.0 uses a red dot reflex for snappy target acquisition at close range.
NC6S Gauss SAW S: Auraxium Medal
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
Available Missions are randomized daily. Higher rarity missions tend to yield better rewards and tend to be more difficult or intense.

Silos store large amounts of Cortium, and use it to power modules and other important constructs nearby. Silos also claim the nearby area for the owner's squad, allowing squadmates to deconstruct misplaced constructs by using the Decon Tool.
The outfit message of the day has changed.
Destroy enemy aircraft with any ground based weapon.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
Repairs armor over time. Damage disables repair for 8 seconds.
Adds the Rhino style hubcaps to your Harasser. NC use only.
Burn fuel to increase the Magrider's top speed for up to 1 second. Fuel recharges from zero to full in 25 seconds.
CS Gift: Squad XP Boost - 1 Hour
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 500 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 700 rounds.
VS - Shared - Auto-Pistol - V5 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Grab that weapon and step up the firing range.
Earn an Auraxium Medal on 3 different carbines.
Increases xp and resource gain by 50% and squad xp gain by 5% for 1 day. Squad xp bonus stacks with other squad xp boosts. Boost can only be used on this character.
Unlock the AR-N203 with a full complement of attachments. For NSO use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 665 rounds.
In the spirit of the Valentine's Day holiday, a Black Market operative known as FL-34 has devised a scheme to bring the factions of Auraxis together (or get rich trying).
Direct hits now strip 75 shield health and 6% maximum ability energy from enemies, and will deal high damage to small deployables, but reduces your bullet damage to 125 at all ranges.
Adds Hubcaps NC003 to your Flash. (DNT)
Reduces the movement speed penalty for crouching.
This customization adds a Purple decal to the cockpit glass. VS use only.
The top-center of the map has a drop-down menu to view other continents.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Magrider to 27 minutes.
Increases the ammo capacity of the weapon to 740 rounds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Apply the Abstract Circle camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
FL-34 is located in the Black Market on Sanctuary.
Next Rank: Regeneration delay caused by damage lowered to 8 seconds.
You are not in a squad.

Activate consuming 668 cortium and for the next 15 seconds main cannon shots do 32% more damage, fly 50% faster and can pierce vehicles. Each shot however will overheat the weapon's cooling system inflicting up to 670 damage to the Colossus.
Cannot activate while deployed.
Customize your aircraft with these sleek Gold Razor Fins. NC use only.
Applies a loyalty decal to your armor or vehicle, celebrating seven years of PlanetSide 2.
Increases the top speed of the Reaver by 8 KPH.
Reduces screen shake caused by explosions by 95%, and you are no longer affected by knockbacks caused by enemies or allies. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 18 rounds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Ayla:</font> I should be able to scare up an old Earth game. But first I need you to test out some implements of winter warfare. Report back when you're done.
Retrieve FL-34's gift from under the tree
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1 missile.
Unlock performance upgrades that improve the maximum strafing speed of the vehicle.
Do not show this tutorial again
Reduces the acquire timer of the Galaxy down to 12.5 minutes.
When activated this provides a temporary burst of speed that can be used to mount an assault or quickly dash to cover.
That waypoint is in the wrong location. Look for the highlighted area on the map and place a personal waypoint there.
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.
Increases the repair speed of the Nano-Armor Kit by 20%; also increases the overheat threshold to 12 seconds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.5 seconds.
Mechanized resources can be used to obtain ground vehicles.

SPECIAL! Contains five implants with a chance of getting T2 implants! In the Platinum pack, each purchase has the chance to grant a bonus NS-11CP, NS-357P Underboss, or NS-15MP platinum weapon to your character!
Apply the single use Zebra camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the amount of damage the deployment shield can withstand by 20%.
The Recon Detection Device's dart pulses every 2.25 seconds to momentarily detect the location of fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 45 meter radius for 40 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 280 rounds.
Adds cosmetic plating to your Prowler. TR use only.
NS Patriot Fare Gun Copper Medal
Reduces damage taken from anti-tank mines by 75%.
Increases the minimum number of shots before the weapon overheats by 2, and reduces rate of fire by 10%.
The Archer anti-materiel rifle was developed by Nanite Systems to counter the heavily armored MAX, providing an effective option at range for dealing with the unique threat of the exo-suits.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 120 rounds.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Prowler to 11 minutes.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 630 rounds.
Target range is displayed on your crosshair, and enemy explosives within 16 meters are automatically spotted.<font color="#dc9c36"> Works in ground vehicles. MAX units can equip.</font>

In VR Training you can practice your aim and experiment with all equipment in safety.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 480 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 80 grenades.
Bring joy to your enemies before you destroy them with this festive Kazoo horn. All factions can use this gear.
Adds 6 rounds to the default magazine size.
Developed for a mix of close quarters combat and point defense, the T32 Bull features both balanced recoil and high maneuverability. TR use only.
We failed to defend the outpost.
Destroy enemy convoy vehicles and the vehicles protecting them.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 420 rounds.
Learn how to identify enemies and friendlies.
Consume an Orbital Strike asset from the outfit armory and call in an orbital strike here.
Squad members have the ability to place a spawn beacon that allows squad members to spawn at that location. Spawn beacons emit a beam of light that is visible to allies and enemies.
Adds cyan chassis lights to the under carriage of the Sunderer. TR use only.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Reaver to 9 minutes.

No longer functional, break down for ISO-4.

Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 420 rounds.
Crafted specifically for TR's Trident arsenal, the TSO-1 provides a clear reflex optic for close-range shooting.

Reverse engineered thanks to the Terran Republic's robust intelligence agency, the razor-sharp Hexedge knife is no less deadly than the stolen Vanu prototypes it's based off of.
The LA78 Nomad's lightweight and quick acquisition sights allow it to acquire targets effectively on the move.
Designed with a lightning-quick receiver, the fully-automatic AS16 Nighthawk features a higher rate of fire than typical shotguns. TR use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Umatherin:</font> And you've been at it since the beginning- surveying the shattered warpgate, researching a new outcrop of organic life, reclaiming vehicles frozen in the snow, and even field-testing prototype of storm-resistant armor.
